OOC: Damn Swiss cheese...

::Lambda::
    She was really quite bored.  She'd been sitting in the CR chamber for she 
didn't know how long.  She pounded on the door to no avail.  She began to 
overhear Burning Hammer's conversation with Nightlight and Zeni.  She needed 
to get out of the CR chamber.  She finally realized she had a second gun and 
shot a hole in the door large enough for her to reach out and open it.

    She stepped into the room rather melodramatically.  "Burning Hammer.  Why 
do you lie to yourself?  Tell yourself that you must kill them because it's 
your job.  Because they didn't trust you after you tried to kill them.  They 
are not gods.  They don't forgive instantly.  You must know that by now.  You 
are not a stupid bot.  I suspect that you liked it here.  You should also 
know that they decided not to erase your memories because they wanted it to 
be your choice to stay.  Don't you understand that they aren't like any other 
faction in this war.  Fighting for members and imposing it on other bots.  If 
they were I would've stepped out shooting.  Actually I wouldn't have because 
I'd now be reprogrammed but I wasn't.  Now can you give me one good reason 
that you should do anything but thank and help these people?"
